name: Boomerang Suicide
description:
Commit ritual suicide for your god using the holy boomerang of sacrifice.

Controls:

Player One - WASD + QE

Player Two - Numpad 8546 + Numpad 7 and 9

Player Three - IKJL + OU

Player Four - Up, Down, Left, Right + PageDown and Delete

Pause - Escape key

Art 

  • Johan Eriksson
  • Drilon Sadiku

Programming

  • Markus Wikström
  • Axel Savage
  • Johan Eriksson

Music

  • Maja Salamon (AQUAGON)
    • Like the amazing music? Head over to Maja's bandcamp and secure your copy -> https://majasalamon.bandcamp.com/track/maja-salamon-boomerang-suicide-ost-ethnic-etherial-orchestral-week-130
